results.adx_keywords: Elections, Governors;Primaries and Caucuses;Elections, House of Representatives;United States Politics and Government;Perez, Thomas E;Moore, Wes (1978- );Schulz, Kelly M;Cox, Daniel L;Democratic Party;Republican Party;Maryland
results.title: Dan Cox, a Trump Loyalist, Wins Maryland’s G.O.P. Primary for Governor
results.abstract: Mr. Cox, who wrote on Twitter during the Capitol riot that Mike Pence was a “traitor,” defeated Kelly Schulz, who had been backed by Gov. Larry Hogan. The Democratic primary was too close to call.

media.caption: Dan Cox at his watch party on Tuesday in Emmitsburg, Md. He spent little on advertising, but he received help from Democrats who saw him as a weaker general-election candidate.
media.copyright: Matt Roth for The New York Times

results.byline: By Jeffery C. Mays and Jonah E. Bromwich
results.title: Bodega Clerk Who Fatally Stabbed Man Will Not Face Charges
results.abstract: Alvin Bragg, Manhattan’s district attorney, said a murder charge against Jose Alba could not be proved. Mr. Alba’s supporters said he acted in self-defense.

media.caption: Jose Alba, left, killed Austin Simon after he went behind the counter at a Harlem bodega and shoved Mr. Alba over an argument with Mr. Simon’s girlfriend.

results.title: New Findings Detail Trump Plan to Use Census for Partisan Gain
results.abstract: A new trove of memos and emails suggests that the plan to add a citizenship question to the 2020 census aimed to cause an undercount that would favor Republicans.

media.caption: A census worker helping New Yorkers fill out their census forms in 2020.
media.copyright: Lev Radin/Pacific Press, via Getty Images

results.adx_keywords: Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides;Madden, Derick Amos;Siau, David (d 2022);Glacier National Park (Mont)
results.byline: By Livia Albeck-Ripka and Claire Fahy
results.title: Driver Hits Family in Montana and Opens Fire, Killing Father and Toddler
results.abstract: David Siau and his 18-month-old daughter, McKenzie, were killed when Derick Amos Madden rammed his vehicle into the family in East Glacier Park, Mont., and shot at them, the authorities said.

media.caption: David Siau, 39, of Syracuse, N.Y., was visiting the town of East Glacier Park, in Montana’s Rocky Mountains, when he and his 18-month-old daughter, McKenzie, were killed, the authorities said.

results.title: Sorry, Summer

results.title: The Biden administration will challenge Mexico’s state control of its energy industry.
results.abstract: The move stems from concerns that Mexico is violating the United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement, which seeks to level the playing field for industries across the continent.
org_facet: Office of the United States Trade Representative

media.caption: Gas flares at a state-owned Pemex plant outside Tierra Blanca, Mexico. Mexico has sought to strengthen its two energy giants, Pemex and the Federal Electricity Commission.
